properties.areaDesc: McDowell Mountains; Mitchell; Caldwell Mountains; Avery; Yancey; Burke Mountains
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 2:35PM EST until January 17 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 40 to 50 mph
expected, especially along the higher ridge tops.

* WHERE...The northern mountains of western North Carolina,
including Avery, Yancey, and Mitchell Counties, as well as
mountain portions of Caldwell, Burke, and McDowell Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 AM Thursday to midnight EST Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST THURSDAY NIGHT
